reviewText:
the "Il trovatore" is certainly one of the very best.
the "falstaff" & rigoletto" are "SO TERRIBLE" - they are beyond contempt.
the "falstaff" was the opening program of the newly remodeled, ROYAL
OPERA HOUSE. these two are the epitome of bad taste.  from the advertisement here in AMAZON you would not be informed any particulars
about either of these two (2) abominable and trashy productions.
